welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kaufering, a charming city known for its quaint streets, picturesque landscapes, and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and enjoy all that Kaufering has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
